definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Brossard is the most ethnically diverse municipality in Quebec.
sentences.chinese: 宝沙是魁北克种族最多样化的直辖市。

sentences.english: It's much more varied.It's much more complex.
sentences.chinese: 它更加的多样化，更多彩也更复杂。

sentences.english: "Grey whales are very generalist in what they feed on," said Dr Scheinin.
sentences.chinese: “灰鲸的食物来源非常多样化，”谢宁博士说。

sentences.english: The bet is that holding yuan-denominated assets is an important feature of a diversified national reserve.
sentences.chinese: 持有人民币资产是国家储备多样化的重要特征。

sentences.english: The agency said diversifying crops and the fishing industry is one key measure.
sentences.chinese: 该机构说，作物的多样化和捕鱼业是一项关键措施。

sentences.english: The motives of the female offenders concerned drugs shows diversity.
sentences.chinese: 涉毒女犯的犯罪动机多样化。

sentences.english: The university diversified the educational program by introducing new subjects.
sentences.chinese: 该大学引进新学科使教育计划多样化。

sentences.english: All these will make the basis of multiple modes and stratifications of higher education in China.
sentences.chinese: 这将奠定中国多层次和多样化高等教育格局的基础。

sentences.english: In the American press, variety is everything.
sentences.chinese: 在美国报刊业，多样化是最为重要的事情。

sentences.english: The restaurant serves a wide variety of dishes.
sentences.chinese: 这家餐厅的菜色非常多样化。

sentences.english: Economic multipolarity offers stability and opportunity, just like a diversified portfolio of investments.
sentences.chinese: 与投资多样化一样，经济多极化可以带来稳定与机遇。

sentences.english: With the diversification of products and corporate development, is now facing the community Employment.
sentences.chinese: 随着产品的多样化和公司的发展，现面向社会诚聘。

sentences.english: The technique and methods of attacker are more and more diversification and delicate.
sentences.chinese: 攻击者的技术和手段越来越多样化和高明化。

sentences.english: The Indo-Chinese Peninsula and Malaysia may be considered as two modern centers of diversity of this genus .
sentences.chinese: 栲属植物现代多样化中心在马来西亚和中南半岛。

sentences.english: The variety in retail results from the dramatical development in retail trade.
sentences.chinese: 业态多样化是零售业迅猛发展的必然结果。

sentences.english: I think the pre-condition for harmony is toaccept diversity.
sentences.chinese: 我认为和谐的前提条件是接受多样化。

definition: to facilitate/expedite/make convenient and fast/speed up
